sentences: As a music director Raaj Aashoo has worked in Hindi films like Tera Intezaar, Romeo Akbar Walter, Luckhnowi Ishq, Sweetiee Weds NRI, Bypass Road, X Ray: The Inner Image, Tutak Tutak Tutiya, Hume Tumse Pyaar Kitna, Kaashi in Search of Ganga, Pareshaanpur and many more.
Seepi recently sang and wrote lyrics for the remake of "Sabki Baaratein Aayi" , whose music was directed by Raaj Aashoo.
